basic_information.scholarship_name: Martin, Wilson, and Associates Endowed Scholarship in Creative Writing

description: This scholarship, established by Jim Martin and Evelyn Wilson, recognizes an undergraduate or graduate student who is pursuing a major in Creative Writing. Eligibility Requirements Majoring in Bachelor of Arts in English- Creative Writing or Master in Arts in Creative Writing Minimum 3.0 GPA Enrolled at UCO with Junior, Senior, or Graduate student status Submit an original writing sample essay or short story with a 500-word minimum Continuing student in the fall semester that scholarship is awarded
